sys_script_include.name: isDateToday

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_2776d5bc1b7200100210fcc8cc4bcb6b
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.isDateToday</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>isDateToday</name><script><![CDATA[var isDateToday = Class.create();
isDateToday.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
		// Instantiate the NeedItUtils class.  Call the isDatePast method and pass 
		// the u_when_needed value.
		var niutils = new NeedItUtils();
		var isPast = niutils.isDatePast(current.u_when_needed);

		// If the isDatePast method returns true, the date is in the past.
		if(isPast == true){
			gs.addErrorMessage("When needed date cannot be in the past.  Your request has not been saved to the database.");
			current.setAbortAction(true);
		}
    },
	
    type: 'isDateToday'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-02-03 18:07:54</sys_created_on><sys_id>2776d5bc1b7200100210fcc8cc4bcb6b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>isDateToday</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2776d5bc1b7200100210fcc8cc4bcb6b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-02-03 18:07:54</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
